ARABIC: لَّن تُغْنِىَ عَنْهُمْ أَمْوَٰلُهُمْ وَلَآ أَوْلَٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًٔا أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ هُمْ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Neither their wealth nor their children will help them at all against Allah. Such people are the Companions of the Fire, remaining in it timelessly, for ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Neither their wealth nor children will avail them against God. They are the people of Hell, and there will abide for ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Neither their possessions nor their offspring will be of any avail to them against Allah. They are the people of the Fire; therein they shall abide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Neither their wealth nor their children will be able to protect them against God. They will be the dwellers of hell fire wherein they will live forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Their wealth and their children will be of no use to them before Allah; they are the people of hell; they are to remain in it forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Their children and their wealth will avail them nothing against Allah. They will be the dwellers of the Fire to dwell therein forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Neither their wealth nor their children shall avail them aught against Allah; they are the inmates of the fire, therein they shall abide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Neither their riches nor their children shall avail them anything against God; those -- they are the inhabitants of the Fire, therein dwelling forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Their wealth and their children will avail them naught against Allah. Such are rightful owners of the Fire; they will abide therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Neither their wealth nor their children will be of the least avail [in protecting them] against God -- they are the inheritors of Hell, and there they shall remain forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: There will not avail them against Allah their riches or their children at all. Th are the fellows of the Fire; therein they will be abiders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Their possessions and children will not avail them in any way against Allah. They shall be the inmates of the Fire and they shall remain in it [forever].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Of no profit whatever to them, against Allah, will be their riches nor their sons: they will be Companions of the Fire, to dwell therein (for aye)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Their children and their wealth will avail them nothing against Allah. They will be (the) dwellers of the Fire, to dwell therein forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Neither their wealth nor their children shall help them a thing against Allah. They are the inhabitants of the Fire, and there they shall live for ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Neither their possessions nor their children will avail them anything against God. These are the inhabitants of the Fire, dwelling therein forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [58:17] Neither their possessions nor their children will avail them in any way against God, against His chastisement. Those — they are the inhabitants of the Fire, wherein they will abide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Their wealth) the abundance of the wealth of the hypocrites and the Jews (and their children) and the abundance of their children (will avail them naught against Allah) against Allah's chastisement. (Such) the hypocrites and the Jews (are rightful owners of the Fire) the inhabitants of the Fire; (they will abide therein) for eternity, neither to die nor leave it.
